description:
os: clarify the documentation for os.Exit
Finishing up a thread started in 6610066 by kln months ago.
Thanks to him for starting the conversation. This CL just
replaces his with text I wrote in the last message of that thread.
It's too old; let's bring it to ground.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

subject: code review 9805044: os: clarify the documentation for os.Exit
